title: Support Hybrid applications and Windows Mobile
body: Support Hybrid (html5, cordova ...) applications and Windows Mobile

comments.body: Hi Erik, I expect you will be able to do some testing on a Hybrid app already but the missing piece will be inspecting the DOM.  Support for this is something we would like to enable in the future.  Thanks for voting for this.
